@graph.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services
@graph.description: Turhan Corporate provides consulting services for company formation and residence permits in Latvia.

@graph.name: Company Formation in Latvia
@graph.description: Comprehensive guide to establishing a company in Latvia, including Limited Liability Companies (SIA), Joint Stock Companies, and Sole Proprietorships, with details on requirements and processes.

publisher.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Assistance with establishing a company in Latvia, including Limited Liability Companies (SIA) with standard or small capital, Joint Stock Companies, and Sole Proprietorships, along with guidance on required documents and processes.

offers.description: Consulting services for company formation in Latvia, including document preparation, registration, and optional services like VAT number application and e-signature setup.
